User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the MiBoletoNic platform.

role.description: The user's role within the platform. This is the source of truth for the custom claim.

promotionsAccepted.description: Indicates if the user accepts promotional emails.

termsAccepted.description: Indicates if the user accepted terms and conditions.

Event.title: Event
Event.description: Represents an event for which tickets are sold.

description.description: A detailed description of the event.

date.description: The date and time of the event in ISO 8601 format.

location.description: The location or venue where the event is held.

capacity.description: The maximum number of attendees allowed for the event.

ticketPrice.description: The price of a single ticket for the event.

image.description: Placeholder ID for the event image.

Order.title: Order
Order.description: Represents an order placed by a user for an event.

quantity.description: The number of tickets purchased in the order.

totalPrice.description: The total price of the order.

transactionId.description: The transaction ID from the payment gateway.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user information and roles. Uses path-based ownership for user-specific data.

/users/{userId}/orders/{orderId}.description: Stores order history for each user. Accessible only by the user and admins.
